attributes.action: Scrap the proposed Off Road Registration Bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This bill which has been proposed by Graham Stringer the labour mp for Manchester Blackley.

The above stated BILL by Mr Stringer has the full potential to Kill all organised legitimate off road motorcycle sport such as GRASSTRACK, SPEEDWAY, MOTORCROSS, and TRIALS.

ACT NOW AND OPPOSE THIS CRANK POT PROPOSAL.

rejection.details: Please remove all the CAPITALS as they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
